report.title: Record data for verification
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record excluding custom attributes for the verification 3 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences co join occurrences o on o.id=co.id and o.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false left join samples sparent on sparent.id=s.parent_id and sparent.deleted=false left join locations l on l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false left join (index_locations_samples ils join locations locality on locality.id=ils.location_id and locality.location_type_id=#locality_type_id# ) on ils.sample_id=s.id left join (users u join people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false ) on u.id=o.created_by_id and u.id<>1 and u.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where co.id=#occurrence_id#

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

param.name: locality_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type used for verification localities

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when co.location_name=s.location_name then co.location_name else co.location_name || COALESCE(' - ' || s.location_name, '') end

column.name: preferred_taxon
column.sql: CASE co.preferred_taxon WHEN co.taxon THEN null ELSE co.preferred_taxon END
